üá∫üá∏ Dear non-Ukrainian, this extension was created to download only files belonging to Ukrainian archives by Ukrainian citizens. Files that are not related to Ukraine and/or not owned by Ukrainian archives are blocked from downloading. Users that aren't Ukrainian citizens shouldn't use this extension.
